R

readDateTime(Date, Scanner, DateFormat) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Validates that the user has entered the valid date time It will otherwise recursively prompt the user to enter the correct menuID/numbers
readOnlyDate(Scanner) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Only allow user to enter date in the following format "dd/MM/yy" otherwise will prompt error message and ask to re-enter
readOnlyDoubles(Scanner) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Only allow the user to enter a double data type otherwise will prompt error message and ask to re-enter The user will not be allow to enter negative number
readOnlyIntegers(Scanner) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Only allow the user to enter an integer value otherwise will prompt error message and ask to re-enter
readOnlyString(Scanner, int, int) - Static method in class Class.customScanner
Only allow user to enter only strings with a limited number of characters" It will otherwise prompt the user to enter the correct number of characters within the limit
readSerializedObject(String) - Static method in class Data.DataManager
Reading from the dat file and return as an array list
